body:
The go 1.4 heapdump is binary incompatible with the go 1.3 heapdump and associated tools (also the documentation had bugs). No public tools currently exists to parse go 1.4 heap dumps. Changes to go 1.3 tools are non trivial, this is a followup from discussion [on the mailing list](https://groups.google.com/forum/#!topic/golang-nuts/V3AQMnjug1Q) regarding the matter.

While I would loved to see this fixed, it is also worth filing in case anyone else runs into it.
